org.openimaj.image.processing.face.recognition

Class EigenFaceRecogniser<FACE extends DetectedFace,PERSON>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.AbstractAnnotator<OBJECT,ANNOTATION>
      • org.openimaj.ml.annotation.IncrementalAnnotator<FACE,PERSON>
        • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.recognition.FaceRecogniser<FACE,PERSON>
          • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.recognition.EigenFaceRecogniser<FACE,PERSON>
  • Type Parameters:
    FACE - Type of DetectedFace
    PERSON - Type of object representing a person
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openimaj.experiment.evaluation.classification.Classifier<PERSON,FACE>, org.openimaj.io.ReadableBinary, org.openimaj.io.ReadWriteableBinary, org.openimaj.io.WriteableBinary, Annotator<FACE,PERSON>, RestrictedAnnotator<FACE,PERSON>, IncrementalTrainer<Annotated<FACE,PERSON>>

    public class EigenFaceRecogniser<FACE extends DetectedFace,PERSON>
extends FaceRecogniser<FACE,PERSON>
    Implementation of a FaceRecogniser based on Eigenfaces. Any kind of machine learning implementation can be used for the actual classification.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static <FACE extends DetectedFace,PERSON> EigenFaceRecogniser<FACE,PERSON> create(int numComponents,
                                                                         FaceAligner<FACE> aligner,
                                                                         int k,
                                                                         DoubleFVComparator compar,
                                                                         float threshold)
        Convenience method to create an EigenFaceRecogniser with a standard KNN classifier, incorporating a threshold on the maximum distance (or minimum similarity) to allow a match.
        Type Parameters:
        FACE - The type of DetectedFace
        PERSON - the type representing a person
        Parameters:
        numComponents - the number of principal components to keep
        aligner - the face aligner
        k - the number of nearest neighbours
        compar - the distance comparison function
        threshold - a distance threshold to limit matches.
        Returns:
        a new EigenFaceRecogniser

      • create

        public static <FACE extends DetectedFace,PERSON> EigenFaceRecogniser<FACE,PERSON> create(int numComponents,
                                                                         FaceAligner<FACE> aligner,

                                                                         DoubleFVComparator compar)
        Convenience method to create an EigenFaceRecogniser with a standard KNN classifier.
        Type Parameters:
        FACE - The type of DetectedFace
        PERSON - the type representing a person
        Parameters:
        numComponents - the number of principal components to keep
        aligner - the face aligner
        k - the number of nearest neighbours
        compar - the distance comparison function
        Returns:
        a new EigenFaceRecogniser
